summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoSecure application. Backend APIs are mostly functional with 2 minor security issues. Frontend UI works excellently with all core features operational including registration, login, file upload, sensitive data detection, encryption, and file management.

security_issues.issue: Returns 200 status code even with incorrect password instead of 400
security_issues.impact: Security vulnerability - wrong passwords appear to succeed

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for missing authentication
minor_issues.impact: Incorrect HTTP status code for authentication failure

integration_issues.issue: Occasional timeout when interacting with password input field

passed_tests: File upload and sensitive data detection (7 patterns detected correctly)
Professional UI design with good contrast and spacing

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core features working with minor dialog interaction issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the file decryption endpoint to return 400 status code for incorrect passwords instead of 200. This is a security vulnerability that needs immediate attention. Also consider changing unauthorized access response from 403 to 401 for consistency.
